about_the_game: This is the first chapter of Dead Horizon. The full game should be seven chapters long. This should give you a very good idea of what the final game will be like.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, death, and general western themes of violence.

detailed_description: This is the first chapter of Dead Horizon. The full game should be seven chapters long. This should give you a very good idea of what the final game will be like.
name: Dead Horizon Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: One that produces sound
  • Additional Notes: If your game doesn't run make sure to still have fun (probably with another game)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: One that produces sound
  • Additional Notes: If your game doesn't run make sure to still have fun (probably with another game)

short_description: Dead Horizon is a point and click adventure game and this is a demo for that game. You should play it because if you don't you won't have played Dead Horizon's demo.
